info.description:
Welcome to a mansion inhabited by devilish muscular ghosts, their pleasure hurting the living, the humiliated but certain are also there to kill the living and all this with their muscles, each ghost has its muscle and these special opinions, but you embodied the owner of these places a man named Quentin who is not a normal man because he can see and talk to the ghost as if he were real but also has the gift that ghosts can choose to be touched, banged or just be transparent even though he remains invisible except to the owner or he remains visible and cannot pass through, and Quentin's other ability is that he is immortal, so he cannot die, but he can be hurt crush except that after a while his body reformed.

Quentin is the ghosts live together is they have a pack together, so that Quentin to create an entertainment site, people can be paid to play with any of the ghosts, because they can choose the name or they can pay for play with all except that on the site it indicates that it is not responsible for everything that happens that people have 100% chance of being injured and must go to the hospital, they also have 85% of chance of having broken bones and being disabled, but they also have 20% of dying. Quentin is that these ghosts are nasty and that once with their victim Quentin no longer has the right to intervene but Quentin must attend all the scenes, because he serves as an intermediary between the living people and the ghosts even if the ghosts hear the living.

but before giving the description of the ghosts here is the story
before dying the mansion belonged to a super-muscular man he had created the club of muscles, this club of muscular men who like to be admired their muscle but before their victim leaves he humiliated them with their muscle and saw their bone crushed , but the leader when he was a more brutal and much stronger and muscular man is when he was in those bad days he kills with those muscles is his strength, he became a serial killer, then in the 2000s, l 'armed decided to kill them all because it becomes dangerous and so they launched the assault and killed all club members in the mansion.

now they are ghosts and it continues, but they are even more dangerous, whoever enters this house comes out with bones or pain that require hospitalization.

as a ghost he has 5 main ones

David: man with big biceps, he likes to be admired, touch those biceps before using those biceps on the body of his victim.

Jonathan: man with big pecs, he likes that we touch these pecs before pushing the head of his victim between these pecs and hurting him in different ways.


Victor: a man with a big muscular buttock is tough, he likes to be admired these buttocks before pushing the head of his victim between these buttocks and then having fun flexing the buttocks harder and harder

Hector: a man with a big thigh and a muscular calf is hard, he likes to be admired & touched these legs before wedging the body of his victim between these thighs or these calves then having fun flexing harder and harder or headscissor, he also likes to hear the bones crack or feel the bones turn to dust under the force of those thighs.

Vincent: the leader, a very tall man and very muscular everywhere, like a huge beast with very hard muscles like rock, he is very dangerous because he can kill easily, he loves to see people running for fear and then placing himself in front them while he runs so that the victim bumps into his body of steel, he likes to make the victim suffer, feel their bone this tablet see crush, he loves to make certain grip but the one he adores the most is the bearhug, attention: don't tell him that you are a soldier (even to laugh) because he becomes uncontrollable and sees red because you would end up dead.
